item.title: About
item.description: About Just some kind of nerd/geek/tech guy…

item.title: Hexo Test Drive
item.description: Introduction Hexo is an alternative of jekyll to create static blog pages from markdown on Github Pages. Implemented with nodejs, Hexo is quite easy to use compared with jekyll. Using Hexo and a theme named “NexT”, I am here now to demonstrate how to create a pretty nice blog site on Github Pages within just a few minutes. Prerequisites To begin with, you’ll need: * node * git * a github account
